languages.text: "Вот как? Вы гордитесь победами и насилием своей крови, не вникая в их природу?" {n}Обычно многословная эльдарка теперь отвечает коротко и напряженно.{/n}
"So that is it? You are proud of the victories and violence of your blood while being ignorant of their true nature?" {n}The usually verbose Yrliet now speaks in short, clipped sentences.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вот как? Вы гордитесь победами и насилием своей крови, не вникая в их природу?" {n}Обычно многословная эльдарка теперь отвечает коротко и напряженно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So that is it? You are proud of the victories and the violence of your blood without trying to understand their nature?" {n}The usually verbose Aeldari now speaks in short and tense sentences.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So that is it? You are proud of the victories and the violence of your blood without trying to understand their nature?" {n}The usually verbose Aeldari now speaks in short and tense sentences.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So that is it? You are proud of the victories and violence of your blood while being ignorant of their true nature?" {n}The usually verbose Yrliet now speaks in short, clipped sentences.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So that is it? You are proud of the victories and violence of your blood while being ignorant of their true nature?" {n}The usually verbose Yrliet now speaks in short, clipped sentences.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So that is it? You are proud of the victories and violence of your blood while being ignorant of their true nature?" {n}The usually verbose Yrliet now speaks in short, clipped sentences.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “只是这样而已吗？你们以胜利与暴力为荣，却对它们的本性一无所知？”{n}平常喜欢长篇大论的伊莉耶特，此时却发出了简短、尖锐的质问。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So that is it? You are proud of the victories and violence of your blood while being ignorant of their true nature?" {n}The usually verbose Yrliet now speaks in short, clipped sentences.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “只是这样而已吗？你们以胜利与暴力为荣，却对它们的本性一无所知？”{n}平常喜欢长篇大论的伊莉耶特，此时却发出了简短、尖锐的质问。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¿Y ya está? ¿Te enorgulleces de las victorias y la violencia de tu linaje, y ni te molestas en conocer su verdadera naturaleza?». {n}Yrliet parece haber perdido su locuacidad y te habla con frases breves y entrecortadas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So that is it? You are proud of the victories and violence of your blood while being ignorant of their true nature?" {n}The usually verbose Yrliet now speaks in short, clipped sentences.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Y ya está? ¿Te enorgulleces de las victorias y la violencia de tu linaje, y ni te molestas en conocer su verdadera naturaleza?». {n}Yrliet parece haber perdido su locuacidad y te habla con frases breves y entrecortadas.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « C'est tout ? Vous affichez fièrement des trophées familiaux obtenus par la violence, sans même chercher à connaître leur véritable nature ? » {n}Habituellement loquace, Yrliet s'exprime maintenant de manière hachée.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So that is it? You are proud of the victories and violence of your blood while being ignorant of their true nature?" {n}The usually verbose Yrliet now speaks in short, clipped sentences.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est tout ? Vous affichez fièrement des trophées familiaux obtenus par la violence, sans même chercher à connaître leur véritable nature ? » {n}Habituellement loquace, Yrliet s'exprime maintenant de manière hachée.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ist das die Erklärung? Ihr seid stolz auf die Siege und die Gewalt Eures Bluts? Dabei wisst Ihr gar nichts darüber?" {n}Die sonst so wortgewandte Yrliet spricht nun in kurzen abgehackten Sätzen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So that is it? You are proud of the victories and violence of your blood while being ignorant of their true nature?" {n}The usually verbose Yrliet now speaks in short, clipped sentences.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ist das die Erklärung? Ihr seid stolz auf die Siege und die Gewalt Eures Bluts? Dabei wisst Ihr gar nichts darüber?" {n}Die sonst so wortgewandte Yrliet spricht nun in kurzen abgehackten Sätzen.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「そういうことか。お前は自分の血の勝利と暴力を誇りに思いながら、その本質を知らないのだな？」{n}いつもは饒舌なユリエットだが、今は短く、歯切れ悪く言葉を紡いでいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So that is it? You are proud of the victories and violence of your blood while being ignorant of their true nature?" {n}The usually verbose Yrliet now speaks in short, clipped sentences.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そういうことか。お前は自分の血の勝利と暴力を誇りに思いながら、その本質を知らないのだな？」{n}いつもは饒舌なユリエットだが、今は短く、歯切れ悪く言葉を紡いでいる。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Öyle mi? İşin aslını merak etmeden soydaşlarının zaferleri ve vahşetiyle gurur mu duyuyorsun?" {n}Genelde çok konuşan Yrliet, kısa cümleler kuruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So that is it? You are proud of the victories and violence of your blood while being ignorant of their true nature?" {n}The usually verbose Yrliet now speaks in short, clipped sentences.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Öyle mi? İşin aslını merak bile etmeden senin kanından olanların zaferleri ve vahşetiyle gurur mu duyacaksın?" {n}Genelde çok konuşan Yrliet artık kısa cümleler kuruyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
